author: Julia Alexander
title: Amazon is making dozens of kids’ shows, including Arthur, completely free
description: Shows like Arthur, Peppa Pig, and Daniel Tiger’s Neighborhood will be available to stream for free on Amazon Prime Video to those without an Amazon Prime account.
content:
Arthur, Daniel Tigers Neighborhood, Pete the Cat, and more 
As more people are asked to stay home due to the novel coronavirus pandemic, Amazon is making a portion of Prime Video kids and family programming free, including popular shows like Arthur, Daniel T… [+1910 chars]
